name: Rent supplement; qualification
text: [§356D-151.5]  Rent supplement; qualification.  Except as provided by federal law, nothing in this chapter shall prevent a person who otherwise qualifies for rent supplement under this chapter from taking up to ninety days (from the day the person's application for rent supplement is approved) to secure a qualified rental dwelling; provided that rent supplement payments shall not commence until a qualified rental dwelling is secured. [L 2008, c 166, §1]
